title: ELineSpec
description: Description of ELineSpec for Ordering - source 57.1

sVlanId.description: The S-VLAN ID to be used for this service.

maximumFrameSize.description: Per MEF 26.2, the maximum frame size provides the upper bounds on the length of an ingress frame. An integer greater or equal to 1526.

colorForwardingEnabled.description: Color Forwarding is an OVC attribute defining the relationship between the color on an egress ENNI frame and the color of the corresponding ingress ENNI Frame or Service Frame. For ordering, this attribute identifies if the Buyer requests Color Forwarding

classOfServiceName.description: The name of the designation given to one or more sets of performance objectives and associated parameters by the Seller (e.g., “Gold”).

ENNIIngressBWProfile.description: The ingress bandwidth profile at ENNI

UNIIngressBWProfile.description: The ingress bandwidth profile at UNI

cir.description: As defined in MEF 26.2 for ENNI & 10.3 for UNI, this value is expressed via Information rate.

cbs.description: As defined in MEF 26.2 for ENNI & 10.3 for UNI, this value is expressed as bytes

eir.description: As defined in MEF 26.2 for ENNI & 10.3 for UNI, this value is expressed via Information rate.

ebs.description: As defined in MEF 26.2 for ENNI & 10.3 for UNI, this value is expressed as bytes

colorMode.description: This enumeration indicates whether the Color Identifier of the Service Frame is considered by the Bandwidth Profile Algorithm

couplingFlag.description: The Bandwidth Profile parameter that determines whether overflow tokens not used for Service Frames declared Green can be used as Yellow tokens.
